footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [wiki](https://github.com/ebaauw/homebridge-deconz/wiki/Configuration).

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log.

brightnessAdjustment.description: Adjustment factor for brightness for adaptive lighting.  Default: 100.

forceHttp.description: Use plain http instead of https.

noResponse.description: Report unreachable lights as No Response in HomeKit.

parallelRequests.description: The number of ansynchronous requests Homebridge deCONZ sends in parallel to a deCONZ gateway.  Default: 10.

stealth.description: Stealth mode: don't make any calls to the Internet.  Default: false.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a response from a deCONZ gateway.  Default: 5.

waitTimePut.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait after sending a PUT request, before sending the next PUT request.  Default: 50.

waitTimePutGroup.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait after sending a PUT request to a group, before sending the next PUT request.  Default: 1000.

waitTimeResend.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait before resending a request after an ECONNRESET or http status 503 error.  Default: 300.

waitTimeReset.description: The timeout in milliseconds, to wait before resetting a characteristic value.  Default: 500.

waitTimeUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait for a change from HomeKit to another characteristic for the same light or group, before updating the deCONZ gateway.  Default: 100.

items.title: Gateway
items.description: Hostname and port of the deCONZ gateway.  Leave empty to discover gateways.

layout.title: Advanced Settings
layout.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
